0: Had a great stay at the revamped hotel
This was a nicely remodeled hotel but gez the rooms were tiny
i stayed here for a few nights and got a fabulous rate the hotel renovations can make you easily forget this used to be the Nascar themed Sahara hotel of a few years ago
The hotel has a luxurious feel and they have done a good job updating an older location
First off the remodel from the old Sahara looks really good
We got a king size bed and our room was very modern in style it was updated which included a state of the art bathroom which included a rain shower
Overall a pretty nice hotel that has been recently remodeled
Very clean and updated game room
This is the old Sahara Hotel and they ’ve done the best they can in updating it
1: Beautiful room and very updated loved loved loved the mirrors and the bed was comfortableI did not like that my room was a little dirty when I first walked in and I asked for clean sheets but was given a slightly stained comforter

Although the property is currently under renovation the suite i stayed in was finished

surrounding not bad but sometimes can see street people wondering around asking for money walking distance to some souvenirs shop and fast food restaurants easy access to airport and downtown by public transportation you have to pass by the renovation construction before get into your rom hotel provides 2 small bottles of waterEvery day

Even though the hotel is undergoing renovations we loved the hotel
in the process of a much needed total remodel the hotel is starting to look great
